getJourneys: SELECT jaratszam, uthossz, indulasi_ido, erkezesi_ido FROM Jarat INNER JOIN Allomas src ON src.id = indulasi_hely INNER JOIN Allomas dst ON dst.id = erkezesi_hely WHERE src.nev = :ih AND dst.nev = :eh AND indulasi_ido >= :ii
getSuggestion: SELECT * FROM(SELECT nev FROM Allomas ORDER BY UTL_MATCH.jaro_winkler(nev, :inp) DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
